content: single_crochet around row 5 chain 1 single_crochet around row 6 chain 1 single_crochet around row 7 repeat from * around until you arrive where you started single_crochet around a plastic or bone ring then fasten_off alternately you could chain your own hook or leave it off entirely weave in ends © jennifer martin 2011 jennmartin80@gmail com v1 1 03/18/2011
